metadata.title: CVE-2013-4584 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: Perdition before 2.2 may have weak security when handling outbound connections, caused by an error in the STARTTLS IMAP and POP server. ssl_outgoing_ciphers not being applied to STARTTLS connections

criterions.comment: perdition package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
